description: Prompts the operator to perform a scale standardization challenge by zeroing the scale, recording weight readings (or manual entry if needed), comparing the measurement against the target range, and logging the results to the equipment log.
intent: Ensure the scale is properly standardized by guiding the operator through the standardization steps and recording pass/fail results.
preconditions: Scale ID and Scale Class have been selected
postconditions: Standardization result is written to the equipment log
Scale status and result variables are updated in the system
side_effects: Manual weight entry may require electronic signatures
Page may close automatically based on RunAllScaleStdz parameter
example_usage: Operator zeros the scale, places the standard weight, clicks Record Weight when stable, optionally enters a manual weight if needed, and clicks Finish to complete the standardization challenge.
